1546830.name: Tiani
1546830.description: Virtual reality meets the world of old school role play! Good must fight and triumph over an evil power intent on the gathering of your land’s magic and the destruction of your people, the Keepers. As you fight your way through the World of Tiani with spell and sword, you have the voice of your sister, Alphita, helping you along the way. An old friend named Milo stands by your side when the fighting is grim. Built exclusively for VR, this adventure of spell and sword will immerse you in a world filled with creatures of darkness, bent on the destruction of all. Made by only one guy, I did my best and only get better as I move on... please, my friends tell me if there are any problems with game play, If you would be so kind, I will will always work to make any and all improvements to game play, love you guys... Gamers.... I mean, like forever........:) ...
1546830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
